meanings.sent1: She bought overmuches of candy at the store.
meanings.sent2: The overmuches of rain caused flooding in the area.
meanings.sent3: The overmuches of ice cream made her stomach ache.

meanings.definition: To an excessive degree or extent.
meanings.sent1: He overmuches his love for chocolate by eating it every day.
meanings.sent2: She overmuches her worries about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat overmuches its affection by constantly rubbing against your legs.
meanings.sent4: The tree overmuches its branches towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The child overmuches his excitement for the birthday party.
